yoast_head:
<!-- This site is optimized with the Yoast SEO plugin v25.2 - https://yoast.com/wordpress/plugins/seo/ -->
<title>Born to Run: 30th Anniversary Edition | Bruce Springsteen</title>
<meta name="description" content="Those waiting for Springsteen reissue treatment to begin regarded this three-disc box with sheer glee; it featured a sterling remaster, a making-of doc, and his first full-length concert DVD, filmed in London at the height of '70s Bruce-mania that captured a band looking to live up to and demolish the hype." />

yoast_head_json.title: Born to Run: 30th Anniversary Edition | Bruce Springsteen
yoast_head_json.description: Those waiting for Springsteen reissue treatment to begin regarded this three-disc box with sheer glee; it featured a sterling remaster, a making-of doc, and his first full-length concert DVD, filmed in London at the height of '70s Bruce-mania that captured a band looking to live up to and demolish the hype.
yoast_head_json.og_description: Those waiting for Springsteen reissue treatment to begin regarded this three-disc box with sheer glee; it featured a sterling remaster, a making-of doc, and his first full-length concert DVD, filmed in London at the height of '70s Bruce-mania that captured a band looking to live up to and demolish the hype.
